fields.label: Slides Classes
fields.name: carousel_slides_classes
fields.instructions: CSS classes that will apply to all slides (as opposed to the entire module)

fields.label: Testimonials Classes
fields.name: testimonial_testimonials_classes
fields.instructions: CSS classes that will apply to all testimonials (as opposed to the entire module)

fields.label: Name
fields.name: template_name
fields.instructions: Enter the location of theme file to load template (e.g. modules/custom-module [no file extension needed])

fields.label: Disable Module
fields.name: disable_module
fields.instructions: Setting this to "Disabled" will keep the module on the back-end, but will not show it on the front-end site.

fields.label: Description
fields.name: blog_description
fields.instructions: Description for top of post listing page
